title: Efficient electro-oxidation-based degradation of per- and polyfluoroalkyl (PFAS) persistent pollutants by using plasma torch synthesized pure-Magnéli phase-Ti<sub>4</sub>O<sub>7</sub> anodes
content:

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 370
